events.name: Astral Aesthetics
events.description: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring design odyssey that transcends the boundaries of the ordinary! Join us at Astral Aesthetics, where the captivating convergence of UI/UX design with the captivating mysteries of the cosmos beckons. Embrace the boundless potential of your creative spirit as you venture into the uncharted domains of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This is your chance to unleash the full breadth of your artistic prowess, illuminating the digital landscape like a dazzling constellation against the dark expanse. Are you poised and ready to etch your distinctive legacy into the ever-expanding universe of web design? Seize this cosmic opportunity and let your ingenuity shine brighter than the stars!
instructions: Rules will be provided during the event.
PCs with VS Code will be provided.
Internet will not be provided.

events.name: Capture the Flag
events.description: Dive into the world of ethical hacking and cybersecurity as teams compete to solve challenges and capture flags.
instructions: Use of personal laptops is allowed.
Internet will be provided.

events.name: Coding Debugging
events.description: Test your problem-solving skills as you debug faulty code under time constraints.
instructions: All code must be written in provided IDEs.
No external libraries allowed.

events.name: Hackathon
events.description: Innovate, collaborate, and build real-world solutions in a 24-hour coding marathon.
instructions: Ideas must be submitted beforehand.
Use of any framework is allowed.

events.name: IOT
events.description: Develop and showcase innovative IoT-based solutions to real-world problems.
instructions: Hardware kits will be provided.
No external components allowed.

events.name: IT Quiz
events.description: Show off your knowledge of the IT world, tech trends, and computing history in this quiz event.
instructions: No electronic devices allowed.
Quiz format will be explained before each round.

events.name: UI/UX
events.description: Design captivating user interfaces and create memorable user experiences.
instructions: All tools must be installed beforehand.
Internet will not be provided.

events.name: Gaming
events.description: Compete in a series of popular esports titles for the championship title.
instructions: Personal gaming gear is allowed.
Game selection will be based on voting.

events.name: IT Manager
events.description: Step into the shoes of an IT manager and solve real-world management problems.
instructions: Scenarios will be provided during the event.
No external materials allowed.

events.name: Photography
events.description: Capture the essence of the event through your lens.
instructions: Photos must be original and unedited.
Judging will be based on creativity and relevance to the theme.

events.name: Surprise Event
events.description: Expect the unexpected! A fun and mysterious event that will test your adaptability.
instructions: Details will be revealed during the event.

events.name: Treasure Hunt
events.description: Embark on a thrilling treasure hunt across the campus, solving puzzles and clues along the way.
instructions: All clues must be solved to win.
Teamwork is essential.
